post:
MultiVPS @ Veeble Hosting - Flat



10% Discount

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



------------------------

MultiVPS is the new definition of VPS for multitaskers. Our



shapeshifting VPS technology, allows you to create multiple Linux and Windows servers, that can change their



form to match different functions. You get the full control to fire up a VPS server at any time, and tear them



down when done. Now create and manage multiple VPS from multiple locations, all using a single account. Start



using Veeble MultiVPS to save tons of your money and time.





MultiVPS





  • Starting from $14.40 per month
  • Unmetered 20/100/1000 Mbps bandwidth
  • Fire up a VPS server at any time, and tear them down when done
  • Set your own configuration for the VPS
  • Scale VPS anytime
  • Smart Control Panel with Shutdown, Boot, Reboot, Re-install and console access.
  • Instant Setup
  • US/UK/NL located servers
  • RAID-10 SSD Storage
  • Linux & Windows OS





Order MultiVPS here https://www.veeble.org/vps/multivps/
